attributes.action: to replace the national anthem  with the song suck and swallow by the australian band the hard ons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we find the current national anthem outdated and a trite stuffy !! we think this song reflects the multicultral uk society and the famed british sense of humour !!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
